ability.Regenerative Scales: Restores 1/8 of Hydrodrake's maximum HP at the end of each turn if it has taken damage during the turn.
ability.Toxic Resilience: Reduces damage from Poison-type moves by 50%.

Hydra Surge.effect: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. If the target is already confused, this move's power increases by 50%.

Venomous Strike.effect: Has a 40% chance to poison the target. If the target is already poisoned, this move's damage is doubled.

Head Rebirth.effect: Restores 1/4 of the user's maximum HP and increases the user's Defense by 1 stage. The user cannot use this move if its HP is full.

Serpents Wrath.effect: Ignores all attacks in two turns.
